ingredients: 1 cup butter, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 3  Hachiya persimmons, pulp extracted, 1  egg, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt, 2   +   1/2 cups chocolate chips
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 12%, Saturated Fat 6g 30%, Cholesterol 20mg 7%, Sodium 152mg 7%, Total Carbohydrate 24g 9%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 13g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 2mg 8%, Calcium 9mg 1%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 70mg 1%
